00119 bool ScriptRayTracer::IsValidPhotonMapType( QString type )
00120 {
00121         if( m_TPhotonMapFactoryList.size() == 0 )        return 0;
00122 
00123         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
00124         for( int i = 0; i < m_TPhotonMapFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00125                         photonMapNames<< m_TPhotonMapFactoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
00126 
00127         int selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( type );
00128         if( selectedPhotonMap < 0 )     return 0;
00129 
00130         return 1;
00131 }

00134 bool ScriptRayTracer::IsValidRandomGeneratorType( QString type )
00135 {
00136         if( m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.size() == 0 )     return 0;
00137 
00138         QVector< QString > randomGeneratorsNames;
00139         for( int i = 0; i < m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00140                 randomGeneratorsNames<< m_RandomDeviateFactoryList[i]->RandomDeviateName();
00141 
00142         int selectedRandom = randomGeneratorsNames.indexOf( type );
00143 
00144         if( selectedRandom < 0 )        return 0;
00145 
00146         return 1;
00147 }

00149 bool ScriptRayTracer::IsValidSurface( QString surfaceName )
00150 {
00151         if( !m_sceneModel )     return false;
00152 
00153         QModelIndex surfaceIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( surfaceName );
00154         InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( surfaceIndex );
00155         if( !selectedSurface )  return false;
00156 
00157         return true;
00158 }

00171 int ScriptRayTracer::SetExportSurface( QString filename, QString surfaceName, bool globalCoordinates )
00172 {
00173         if( filename.isEmpty() || surfaceName.isEmpty() )       return 0;
00174 
00175         QModelIndex surfaceIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( surfaceName );
00176         InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( surfaceIndex );
00177         if( !selectedSurface )  return 0;
00178 
00179         if( globalCoordinates ) return trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates( filename, selectedSurface, m_wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00180         else    return trf::ExportSurfaceLocalCoordinates( filename, selectedSurface, m_wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00181 }

00196 int ScriptRayTracer::SetPhotonMapType( QString typeName )
00197 {
00198         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
00199 
00200         for( int i = 0; i < m_TPhotonMapFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00201                 photonMapNames<< m_TPhotonMapFactoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
00202 
00203         m_selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName );
00204         if( m_selectedPhotonMap < 0 )   return 0;
00205 
00206         return 1;
00207 }

00209 int ScriptRayTracer::SetRandomDeviateType( QString typeName )
00210 {
00211         QVector< QString > randomGeneratorsNames;
00212         for( int i = 0; i < m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.size(); i++ )
00213                 randomGeneratorsNames<< m_RandomDeviateFactoryList[i]->RandomDeviateName();
00214 
00215         int selectedRandom = randomGeneratorsNames.indexOf( typeName );
00216         if(  selectedRandom < 0 )
00217         {
00218                 m_randomDeviate = 0;
00219                 return 0;
00220         }
00221 
00222         m_randomDeviate = m_RandomDeviateFactoryList[selectedRandom]->CreateRandomDeviate();
00223         return 1;
00224 }

00253 int ScriptRayTracer::SetTonatiuhModelFile ( QString filename )
00254 {
00255         delete m_document;
00256         m_document = 0;
00257 
00258         m_document = new Document;
00259         if( !m_document->ReadFile( filename ) ) return 0;
00260 
00261         delete m_sceneModel;
00262         m_sceneModel = 0;
00263         m_sceneModel = new SceneModel;
00264         m_sceneModel->SetCoinScene( *m_document->GetSceneKit() );
00265 
00266         return 1;
00267 }
00268 
00269 int ScriptRayTracer::Trace()
00270 {
00271         delete m_photonMap;
00272         m_photonMap = 0;
00273 
00274         if( m_selectedPhotonMap > -1 )  m_photonMap = m_TPhotonMapFactoryList[m_selectedPhotonMap]->CreateTPhotonMap();
00275         if( !m_photonMap )
00276         {
00277                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no photonMap defined"<<std::endl;
00278                 return 0;
00279         }
00280         if( !m_randomDeviate )
00281         {
00282                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no random generator defined"<<std::endl;
00283                 return 0;
00284         }
00285 
00286         if( !m_sceneModel )
00287         {
00288                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no model defined"<<std::endl;
00289                 return 0;
00290         }
00291 
00292         QModelIndex sceneIndex;
00293         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneIndex );
00294         if ( !sceneInstance )
00295         {
00296                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no scene defined"<<std::endl;
00297                 return 0;
00298         }
00299 
00300         InstanceNode* rootSeparatorInstance = sceneInstance->children[1];
00301         if( !rootSeparatorInstance )
00302         {
00303                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no scene root defined"<<std::endl;
00304                 return 0;
00305         }
00306 
00307         InstanceNode* lightInstance = sceneInstance->children[0];
00308         if ( !lightInstance )
00309         {
00310                 std::cerr<<"ScriptRayTracer::Trace() no light defined"<<std::endl;
00311                 return 0;
00312         }
00313 
00314 
00315         SoSceneKit* coinScene =  static_cast< SoSceneKit* >( sceneInstance->GetNode() );
00316 
00317         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return 0;
00318         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", true ) );
00319         if( m_sunPosistionChnaged )     lightKit->ChangePosition( m_sunAzimuth, tgc::Pi/2 - m_sunElevation/*, m_sunDistance*/ );
00320 
00321         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return 0;
00322         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00323         double irradiance  = m_irradiance;
00324         if( irradiance < 0 ) irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
00325 
00326         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return 0;
00327         TLightShape* raycastingSurface = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00328 
00329         if( !lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,true ) ) return 0;
00330         SoTransform* lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,true ) );
00331         Transform lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( lightTransform );
00332         lightInstance->SetIntersectionTransform( lightToWorld. GetInverse() );
00333 
00334         QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList;
00335 
00336         //Compute bounding boxes and world to object transforms
00337         trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( rootSeparatorInstance, Transform( new Matrix4x4 ), &surfacesList );
00338 
00339         TLightKit* light = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( lightInstance->GetNode() );
00340         light->ComputeLightSourceArea( surfacesList );
00341 
00342         QVector< double > raysPerThread;
00343         const int maximumValueProgressScale = 100;
00344         unsigned long  t1 = m_numberOfRays / maximumValueProgressScale;
00345         for( int progressCount = 0; progressCount < maximumValueProgressScale; ++ progressCount )
00346                 raysPerThread<< t1;
00347 
00348         if( ( t1 * maximumValueProgressScale ) < m_numberOfRays )       raysPerThread<< ( m_numberOfRays-( t1* maximumValueProgressScale) );
00349 
00350         //ParallelRandomDeviate* m_pParallelRand = new ParallelRandomDeviate( *m_rand,140000 );
00351         // Create a QFutureWatcher and connect signals and slots.
00352         QFutureWatcher< TPhotonMap* > futureWatcher;
00353 
00354         QMutex mutex;
00355         QFuture< TPhotonMap* > photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_randomDeviate, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
00356         futureWatcher.setFuture( photonMap );
00357 
00358         futureWatcher.waitForFinished();
00359 
00360         if( !m_photonMap ) return 1;
00361         if( m_photonMap->StoredPhotons() == 0 ) return 1;
00362 
00363         double inputAperture = raycastingSurface->GetArea();
00364         m_wPhoton = ( inputAperture * irradiance ) / m_numberOfRays;
00365 
00366         return 1;
00367 }
